channel.title: Writing To A URL
channel.description:
I'm about to make a website, the website is mainly for players, to check things, logs, etc.
I know how to read from a URL with a password and username, but i need to know how to write, if possible. Because i've looked and i can't find.
For example, when a person is banned, it will write to my bannedusers.txt as well as the websites bannedusers.txt .
Hopefully someone can help me, thanks in advance.
I got it write to my CMD, i put some random text into the file.
[code]P00nageScape V.5 Is Now Running On 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3726 PlayerID: 84722335 teh x n00b is signing onto server. This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work This is what it has: this a test This is what it has: this should write This is what it has: to my CMD window This is what it has: so hopefully This is what it has: this will work[/code]
EDIT:
I'm not sure which writer it is:
FileOutputStream
Or there such thing as:
InputStreamWriter

item.title: Writing To A URL
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Then why did you say “wish i could help you but firsti would have to know how to code java into a website.” ?

Talking about your family doesn’t really help anyone, now does it?

Read full topic

item.title: Writing To A URL
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

i know its javascript i said im not good at java in the first place and sorry i was just trying to help

Read full topic

item.title: Writing To A URL
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I really didn’t want to know about your family, i just want someone to tell me which writer is it(not BufferedWriter), i don’t want a program to do the work for me, i want to make it myself, ++ i’m getting help from a site, but still, i can’t find the writer.

You can’t program java into a website, it’s not java, it’s javascript for websites.

I’m only using java to write to a file that is on a website.

Looks like you didn’t inherit you dad’s so called genes.

Read full topic

damn i wish i could help you but firsti would have to know how to code java into a website my dad says there are programs that do this for you try to google it? if u havent and my dad is verry good at coding and superb at computers like me and the rest of my family

item.title: Writing To A URL
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I’m using:

InputStream

That writes to a file, but not over the net.

I’m writing the Reader now…

[code]public void Access() {
try {
URL PS = new URL(“http://serveroutput.50webs.com/P00nageScape/bannedusers.txt”);

BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(PS.openStream()));
String inIt;
while((inIt = in.readLine()) != null) {
/inIt = text
}
in.close();
[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

try { BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("outfilename")); out.write("aString"); out.close(); } catch (IOException e) { }
